scripts.generate-icons: npm run generate-icons:main && npm run generate-icons:apple
scripts.generate-icons:main: for size in 72 96 128 144 152 192 384 512; do convert public/icon.svg -resize ${size}x${size} public/icon-${size}.png; done
scripts.generate-screenshots: convert public/screenshot-mobile.svg -resize 640x1136 public/screenshot-mobile.png && convert public/screenshot-desktop.svg -resize 1280x800 public/screenshot-desktop.png
scripts.generate-assets: npm run generate-icons && npm run generate-screenshots
